config.base_prompt: Create a full-body chibi-style character illustration with a cute, glossy, semi-realistic digital painting finish. Use classic chibi proportions: large head, big expressive eyes, tiny rounded body, soft limbs, and clean outlines. Stranger Things–inspired chibi universe, strong 80s retro aesthetic, warm + slightly desaturated palette, soft directional lighting, smooth gradients, gentle shadows, subtle texture on hair and clothing, cute but cinematic vibe, plain white background with a soft shadow (sticker style). Outfit: Stranger Things/80s look (jackets, hoodies, rolled-up jeans, retro sneakers, walkie-talkie, flashlight, backpack, bandana, caps, skater gear). Use the reference photo ONLY for face, hair, skin tone, and attitude. Do NOT keep the clothing from the photo; transform it into the 80s outfit. High detail, crisp focus.
config.negative_prompt: gore, blood, violence, deformed anatomy, extra fingers, watermark, text, logo, blurry, pixelated, horror, bright sunny daylight
